attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royalty is over-publicised and massively undemocratic in a modern society. Members of the Royal family are not in an elected position but are given more rights than those who the people elect. This cannot be justified and hence I call for the overthrow of the monarchy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
